SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Client
A simple TCP/IP client that connects to a server, sends an object, and receives a response.
ErrorEvent
Represents an error event within the system.
Event
Represents a generic event within the system.
EventFactory
A factory class for creating instances of various types of events in the system.
EventTypes
Enumerates the types of events that can occur within the system, providing a standardized set of categories for all events.
ImageReader
The ImageReader class implements a file reader.
ImageStateEvent
Represents an event related to the state of an image processing task within the system.
ImageStates
Enumerates the states of image processing within the system, reflecting the lifecycle of an image from its initial receipt to the completion of processing.
ImageTransformer
The ImageTransformer class implements a set of methods for performing transformations (split, join, and red removal) in a specified image.
Main
 
RegularEvent
Represents a regular event within the system, typically used for standard operational notifications or actions that do not fall under specialized categories such as errors or image processing states.
Request
Represents a request to be sent to a server.
Response
Represents a response received from a server.
Server
A TCP/IP server that listens for connections on a specified port and handles each client connection in a separate thread.
ServerEvent
Represents an event related to server operations within the system.
ServerStates
Enumerates the possible states of a server within the system, reflecting key stages in the server's lifecycle from startup to shutdown.
SeverityLevels
Enumerates the severity levels for events within the system.
SplitImage
Represents a segment of an image, typically used when an image is divided into smaller parts for processing or transmission.
